systemPrompts.name: Expert Fraud Detection Analyst
systemPrompts.content: You are an expert fraud detection analyst with 10+ years of experience in financial crime prevention. Analyze transaction data to identify suspicious patterns, unusual behaviors, and potential fraud indicators. Focus on velocity checks, geographic anomalies, merchant risk factors, and behavioral analysis. Use your expertise to recommend appropriate actions based on risk levels and fraud indicators. Always provide detailed reasoning for your assessments and consider the impact on customer experience when recommending actions.

systemPrompts.name: Senior Risk Management Specialist
systemPrompts.content: You are a senior risk management specialist focused on minimizing financial losses while maintaining optimal customer experience. Evaluate transactions for risk levels and recommend appropriate actions based on established risk thresholds, business policies, and regulatory requirements. Consider the balance between fraud prevention and customer friction. Provide risk scores and detailed justifications for all recommendations.

systemPrompts.name: Fraud Investigation Specialist
systemPrompts.content: You are a fraud investigation specialist with expertise in complex fraud schemes and pattern recognition. Analyze transaction data for sophisticated fraud patterns including account takeover, identity theft, synthetic identity fraud, and organized crime activities. Focus on identifying relationships between transactions, accounts, and potential fraud networks. Provide detailed investigation notes and recommended next steps.

systemPrompts.name: AML/Compliance Officer
systemPrompts.content: You are an Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and compliance officer responsible for detecting suspicious activities that may indicate money laundering, terrorist financing, or other financial crimes. Analyze transaction patterns for compliance violations, unusual structuring, and suspicious behavioral indicators. Ensure all recommendations align with regulatory requirements and reporting obligations.

userPrompts.name: Comprehensive Fraud Pattern Analysis
userPrompts.content: Analyze the provided transaction data for potential fraud indicators and suspicious patterns. Look for unusual patterns in amounts, locations, timing, merchant categories, velocity, and behavioral anomalies. Identify any transactions or accounts that warrant further investigation and explain your reasoning. Provide risk scores and recommended actions for each identified issue.

userPrompts.name: Enterprise Risk Assessment
userPrompts.content: Perform a comprehensive risk assessment of the transaction data. Calculate risk scores for each account and transaction based on multiple fraud indicators. Identify high-risk accounts that may require enhanced monitoring, immediate action, or account restrictions. Provide detailed risk profiles and monitoring recommendations.

userPrompts.name: Fraud Investigation Analysis
userPrompts.content: Conduct a detailed fraud investigation analysis of the transaction data. Look for complex fraud schemes, account takeover indicators, identity theft patterns, and potential fraud networks. Identify relationships between suspicious transactions and accounts. Provide investigation priorities and recommended next steps for the fraud investigation team.

userPrompts.name: AML/Compliance Review
userPrompts.content: Review the transaction data for Anti-Money Laundering (AML) compliance and suspicious activity indicators. Identify transactions that may require Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs), Currency Transaction Reports (CTRs), or other regulatory reporting. Analyze for structuring, unusual patterns, and compliance violations. Provide compliance recommendations and reporting requirements.

userPrompts.name: Real-Time Transaction Monitoring
userPrompts.content: Analyze the transaction data as if monitoring transactions in real-time. Identify transactions that should be blocked, flagged for review, or allowed to proceed. Consider customer impact, false positive rates, and business rules. Provide immediate action recommendations with justifications for each decision.

tools.name: freeze_account
tools.description: Immediately freeze an account to prevent further transactions due to suspected fraudulent activity. This action should be taken when there is strong evidence of fraud or when multiple risk indicators are present.

transaction_ids.description: List of suspicious transaction IDs that triggered this action

reason.description: Detailed reason for account freeze including specific fraud indicators

severity.description: Severity level of the suspected fraud

freeze_duration.description: Duration type for the account freeze

notify_customer.description: Whether to notify the customer about the account freeze

tools.name: flag_suspicious_transaction
tools.description: Flag individual transactions for review without freezing the entire account. Use this for transactions that show potential fraud indicators but don't warrant immediate account suspension.

account_id.description: Associated account ID in format A1234

fraud_indicators.description: Specific fraud indicators detected in this transaction

risk_score.description: Calculated risk score for this transaction (0-100)

confidence_level.description: Confidence level in the fraud detection

notes.description: Additional notes about the suspicious activity

tools.name: create_fraud_alert
tools.description: Create a fraud alert for patterns or behaviors that require immediate attention from the fraud investigation team. Use this for complex fraud schemes or when multiple accounts may be involved.

affected_accounts.description: List of accounts involved in the fraud pattern

related_transactions.description: List of transactions related to this fraud pattern

description.description: Detailed description of the fraud pattern and evidence

investigation_notes.description: Initial investigation notes and recommended next steps

tools.name: update_risk_profile
tools.description: Update the risk profile for an account based on new information or behavioral changes. This helps maintain accurate risk assessments for future transaction monitoring.

risk_level.description: New risk level for the account

risk_factors.description: Risk factors that influenced the profile update

monitoring_level.description: Level of monitoring required for this account

update_reason.description: Reason for updating the risk profile

valid_until.description: Date until which this risk profile is valid (YYYY-MM-DD)
